channel.title: Stockwatch - Key Events
channel.description: Real-time corporate announcements, deals, and financial results.

item.title: [ZENTEC] ZEN Technologies Secures ESG Score of 67 in DJSI CSA for FY 2024-25
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

ZEN Technologies Ltd. has secured an ESG score of 67 in the Dow Jones Sustainability Index (DJSI) Corporate Sustainability Assessment (CSA) for the financial year 2024-25. The company achieved scores of 61 in Environmental, 72 in Social, and 69 in Governance & Economic dimensions. The company's ESG framework reflects its commitment to responsible growth and purposeful innovation, guided by the theme 'Responsible Readiness'.

  • ZEN Technologies secures an ESG score of 67 in DJSI CSA for FY 2024-25
  • Achieved scores of 61 in Environmental, 72 in Social, and 69 in Governance & Economic dimensions
  • Guided by the theme 'Responsible Readiness'
  • Score reflects commitment to responsible growth and purposeful innovation
  • Sustainability efforts contribute to long-term value creation

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: ZEN TECHNOLOGIES LTD. | Category: Monthly Update

item.title: [DJML] DJ Mediaprint & Logistics Ltd Reports Q3-FY 2025-26 Financial Results with 16.39 Lakh Increase in Total Income
item.description:
DJ Mediaprint & Logistics Ltd has reported its un-audited financial results for Q3-FY 2025-26. The company's total income stands at 7,011.09 Lakh, an increase of 16.39 Lakh compared to the same period last year. The board approved the results and took on record the limited review reports. The company operates in two segments: Printing Business and Record Management & Services.

  • DJ Mediaprint & Logistics Ltd reports Q3-FY 2025-26 un-audited financial results.
  • Total income stands at 7,011.09 Lakh, an increase of 16.39 Lakh compared to the same period last year.
  • The board approved the results and took on record the limited review reports.
  • The company operates in two segments: Printing Business and Record Management & Services.

Company: DJ Mediaprint & Logistics Ltd | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [INDSWFTLAB] Ind-Swift Laboratories Confirms No Deviation in Use of Funds Raised Through Preferential Issue of Convertible Warrants
item.description:
Ind-Swift Laboratories Ltd. has confirmed that there is no deviation or variation in the use of funds raised through Preferential Issue of Convertible Warrants. A Nil Statement of Deviation, reviewed by the Audit Committee, for the Quarter ended 31st December, 2025 has been given in Annexure A. The preferential issue proceeds of the Company as utilized during the quarter ended 31.12.2025 for the objects of the issue are given in the Statement of Deviation or Variation.

  • Ind-Swift Laboratories confirmed no deviation in use of funds raised through Preferential Issue of Convertible Warrants.
  • A Nil Statement of Deviation reviewed by the Audit Committee has been given.
  • The preferential issue proceeds have been utilized for the objects of the issue as per the original plan.
  • No deviation in utilization of funds from those stated in the letter of offer.
  • The Statement of Deviation or Variation has been provided for the Quarter ended 31.12.2025.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: IND-SWIFT LABORATORIES LTD. | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [STUDDS] Studds Accessories Ltd Delays Commercial Production at Manufacturing Facility-V Due to GRAP Standards Implementation
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Studds Accessories Ltd, a leading manufacturer of helmets and accessories, has reported a delay in the commencement of commercial production at its Manufacturing Facility-V located in Faridabad, Haryana, India. The delay is due to the implementation of GRAP standards as an emergency measure to combat severe air pollution in the Delhi-NCR region. The company expects the commercial production to begin before the end of Q2 of FY 2027, subject to receipt of requisite approvals and improvement in prevailing conditions. The update was reviewed and noted in the Board Meeting held on January 31, 2026. The company's financial results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025, were also approved in the same meeting.

  • Studds Accessories Ltd delays commercial production at Manufacturing Facility-V due to GRAP standards implementation.
  • The delay is expected to be resolved before the end of Q2 of FY 2027.
  • The decision was reviewed and noted in the Board Meeting held on January 31, 2026.
  • The company's financial results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025, were also approved in the meeting.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Studds Accessories Ltd | Category: Business Update

item.title: [UTLSOLAR] Fujiyama Power Systems Reports 73.8% YoY Growth in Q3 FY26 Revenue from Operations
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Fujiyama Power Systems Limited, a leading provider of rooftop solar solutions in India, has announced its unaudited financial results for the quarter ended 31st December 2025. The company reported a 73.8% YoY growth in Q3 FY26 Revenue from Operations, with EBITDA more than doubling and expanding to 18.7%. The company added over 60 distributors, 400 dealers, and 20 exclusive Shoppes during the quarter, taking the total channel partner base to over 8,200. Fujiyama also commissioned a 1 GW solar cell manufacturing facility at Dadri, Uttar Pradesh, based on Mono PERC technology, with an investment of around Rs. 300 crore.

  • Q3 FY26 Revenue from Operations at Rs. 5,885 Mn; up 73.8% YoY
  • Q3 FY26 EBITDA at Rs. 1,099 Mn; up 110.1% YoY with a margin of 18.7%
  • Q3 FY26 PAT at Rs. 673 Mn; up 124.3% YoY with a margin of 11.4%
  • Commissioned a 1 GW solar cell manufacturing facility at Dadri, Uttar Pradesh
  • Added over 60 distributors, 400 dealers and 20 exclusive Shoppes in Q3 FY2026

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Fujiyama Power Systems Ltd | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [ZENTEC] Zen Technologies Announces Q3 & 9MFY26 Financial Results, Reports 177.82 Crore Revenue
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Zen Technologies, a leading anti-drone technology and defence training solutions provider, has announced its financial results for Q3 & IMFY26. The company reported a revenue of 177.82 crore, with an operational EBITDA of 54.77 crore and a profit after tax of 47.82 crore. The revenue was impacted due to delays in procurement orders, but the company witnessed a sharp acceleration in order inflows during and after the quarter, with cumulative order inflows of 931 crore. The company expects a stronger financial performance in FY27, supported by higher execution across both the standalone business and subsidiaries.

  • Revenue of 177.82 crore in Q3 FY26
  • Operational EBITDA of 54.77 crore
  • Profit after tax of 47.82 crore
  • Cumulative order inflows of 931 crore
  • Expected stronger financial performance in FY27

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: ZEN TECHNOLOGIES LTD. | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [FILATEX] Filatex India Ltd. to Approve Q3 and Nine Months Financial Results on Feb 7, 2026
item.description:
Filatex India Ltd. has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 07/02/2026. The meeting will consider and approve the standalone and consolidated Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended 31Â° December, 2025. The 'Trading Window' for dealing in the Equity Shares of the Company has been closed from January 01, 2026 till the end of 48 hours after declaration of above financial results for the Directors/Promoters/KMPs/Designated Employees/ Auditor / law firms, etc. of the Company.

  • Filatex India Ltd. to consider and approve Q3 and nine months financial results on Feb 7, 2026

item.title: [ELLEN] Ellenbarrie Industrial Gases Commissions New 220 TPD Plant in Uluberia, West Bengal
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Ellenbarrie Industrial Gases Limited has announced the commissioning of a new plant, Uluberia-II, at Uluberia, West Bengal. The plant, which has a capacity of 220 TPD, has begun its operations. The announcement was made at a Board of Directors meeting and has been disseminated on the company's website.

  • Ellenbarrie Industrial Gases has commissioned a new plant, Uluberia-II, in Uluberia, West Bengal
  • The new plant has a capacity of 220 TPD
  • The plant has started its operations
  • The announcement was made at a Board of Directors meeting
  • The information has been shared on the company's website

Company: Ellenbarrie Industrial Gases Ltd | Category: New Launch

item.title: [ELLEN] Ellenbarrie Industrial Gases Approves Q3 Results and Commissions New Plant
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Ellenbarrie Industrial Gases Ltd. has approved the unaudited financial results for the quarter ended December 31, 2025, and announced the commissioning of its new plant, Uluberia - II, at Uluberia, West Bengal, with a capacity of 220 TPD. The plant commenced operations on January 31, 2026. The company's revenue from operations stands at 813.46 million for the quarter and 2,541.49 million for the nine-month period ended December 31, 2025.

  • Ellenbarrie Industrial Gases approved the unaudited financial results for Q3 2025
  • The company's revenue from operations for Q3 2025 is 813.46 million
  • The company has commissioned a new plant, Uluberia - II, with a capacity of 220 TPD
  • The Uluberia - II plant commenced operations on January 31, 2026
  • The company's revenue from operations for the nine-month period ended December 31, 2025, is 2,541.49 million

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Ellenbarrie Industrial Gases Ltd | Category: Quarterly Updates

item.title: [GANECOS] Ganesha Ecosphere Ltd to Approve Q3 and Nine Months Financial Results on February 07, 2026
item.description:
Ganesha Ecosphere Ltd has announced that its Board of Directors will meet on February 07, 2026, to consider and approve the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results (Provisional) for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025. The trading window for the company's equity shares has been closed from January 1, 2026, till 48 hours after the announcement of the Unaudited Financial Results on February 07, 2026.

  • Ganesha Ecosphere Ltd to consider and approve Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025.
  • The meeting of the Board of Directors is scheduled for February 07, 2026.
  • Trading window for the company's equity shares is closed from January 1, 2026, till 48 hours after the financial results announcement.
